response.original_title: Kingston and the Magician’s Lost & Found
response.overview: Kingston’ is an adventure that is epic and intimate, set in a world that is both mysterious and familiar — with a story and characters our audience can relate to and be awed by. The adventure, emotion and authenticity in these books align with our mission to tell stories that not only engage and entertain but remind us that there is magic all around us, even in the most unexpected places.
response.title: Kingston and the Magician’s Lost & Found
